name: Peat Mammoth
description: A gigantic creature with a plant-based nature, the Peat Mammoth is adapted to swampy environments and is known for its robust size and defensive capabilities. Its body is saturated like a sponge, emphasizing its plant aspect.
memorable: Its ability to ignite when taking fire damage and explode upon death creates a tactical challenge, while its capacity to engulf foes adds to its menace.
goals: Typically aims to ambush foes, control its environment, and dominate in combat through its unique abilities.
relations: May inhabit areas alongside other swamp creatures or serve as a protector of its territory.
environment: Mostly found in swamps and marsh areas, making use of its camouflage among the foliage.
strengths: High strength and constitution scores grant it powerful melee attacks and significant hit points; resistant to fire and necrotic damage.
weaknesses: Low agility and dexterity resulting in poor movement and difficulty avoiding fast foes.
attacks: Can perform devastating melee slam attacks and has the ability to engulf opponents, restraining them and dealing damage.
most_powerful_ability: The 'Slow Burn' ability allows it to catch fire upon taking fire damage, leading to ongoing burning damage and an explosion upon death.
senses: Possesses blindsight out to 120 feet, allowing it to detect creatures in its vicinity without relying on sight.
skills: Has a +6 bonus in stealth due to its swamp camouflage, allowing it to ambush foes effectively.
additional_information: Immune to conditions like blinded, deafened, or frightened.
Can engulf two creatures at once, making it a significant threat in combat.
Ignites when taking fire damage, creating tactical challenges.
Explodes upon death while on fire, dealing area damage.
Advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks in swampy terrain.

massive plant creature found in swamps
peat mammoth ambush tactics in marshes
monster that engulfs and restrains enemies
